animeTitle: Kyonshii Kyon Dai no Koutsuu Anzen
animeDescription: A traffic safety film starring a kyonshii, known as a Chinese hopping vampire/zombie (natively called jianshi in Chinese but kyonshii in Japan). Kyonshii horror films were popular in the late 80s.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Fire Robo 119 tai Kyonshii Kyon Dai']
